Name: (Custom) Demeo Revolutions (LEGENDARY)
Description: Everything that has a beginning has a LEGENDARY ending.
Longdesc:
- Some NEW maps and many NEW enemies
- Some already known enemies now have NEW hidden abilities
- Each enemy (even if the same type) can have different health AND attack damage
- Each floor's enemy spawns will be a mix of ALL existing adventures with NO respawns
- Each floor's map will be from a different adventure
- No Lamps or Antitoxins as loot
- Improved chest, energy (mana), and potion stand loot
- Hunter's Mark, Invisibility Potions, and Adamant Potions only last 2 for rounds instead of 3
- Strength, Swiftness, and Magic stats can be increased up to 5 times with potions instead of 3
- Lamp spawns found throughout each floor are now much more random
- Pets and charmed creatures will always focus on Hunter's Marked targets
- Number of chests/stands/fountains/traders per floor changed based on the adventure selected
- Card energy (mana) gained from attacks reduced by 40%
- Card energy (mana) gained from recycled cards decreased by 20%
- Healing Potion heals for 5, Water Bottle heals for 2, and Rejuvenation/Fountains heal for 8
- Reviving a player by any means removes Stunned and Frozen effects
- Thorns debuff now also does 2 damage per turn
- Player summons (Ballistas, Detect Enemies, Verochka, etc) inflict effects on enemies who hit them
- Some abilities (Acid Spit, Sigataur Javelin, Turrets, etc) now have added secondary effects
- Critical hits award 10 gold to that player or if on the last map will heal that player for 1 (if hurt)
- Attacks and critical hits always have a 2% chance to heal players for 1 and 2 health respectively
- All classes start with 2 knockdowns (extra lives) instead of 3
- Class turn order starts as Bard, Guardian, Warlock, Sorcerer, Barbarian, Hunter and then Assassin
- Dropped Torches have 4 health instead of 15
- Arly Owl's health is now 8 and movement is now 5
- Arly Owl's panic shot now also Nets non-bosses so they can't move unless they use an ability to do so
- A NEW Energy Potion loot card that affects all players with mysterious effects
- Elementals, Giant Slimes, and the Elven Queen will counter-attack for 1 when hit with melee damage
- Each floor's original keyholder start with 1 innate damage resist and 1 counter-attack to melee
- When a player is holding a key they gain 1 damage resist and 1 counter-attack to melee
- All bosses will start with more health, are immune to Barbarian's Net, and have 1 innate damage resist
- The Elven Queen has new self buffs and abilities to add more of a challenge
- If playing Roots of Evil the players with javelins will be first in turn order on the LAST floor
